languages.text: "Это тема для официального брифинга, а не обычной беседы, но я попробую ответить кратко — и, если позволите, своими словами". {n}Абеляр набирает в грудь воздуха и начинает.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g} значительно удален от сердца Империума. Это значит, что здешние {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}-пути приходят в негодность за считанные месяцы, маршруты регулярно подвергаются нападениям разнообразного сброда, а в единственном крупном порту бок о бок швартуются пиратские посудины и имперские фрегаты".

traits.locale_text: "Это тема для официального брифинга, а не обычной беседы, но я попробую ответить кратко — и, если позволите, своими словами". {n}Абеляр набирает в грудь воздуха и начинает.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g} значительно удален от сердца Империума. Это значит, что здешние {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}-пути приходят в негодность за считанные месяцы, маршруты регулярно подвергаются нападениям разнообразного сброда, а в единственном крупном порту бок о бок швартуются пиратские посудины и имперские фрегаты".

languages.text: "This is a topic for an official briefing, not a casual conversation, but I will try to answer succinctly — and, if you permit, in my own words." {n}Abelard takes a breath and begins.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} is considerably removed from the heart of the Imperium. This means that local {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes become useless within months, established pathways are regularly subject to attacks from all kinds of rabble, and in the only major port, the Imperium's frigates find themselves moored alongside pirate vessels."
languages.original_text: "Это тема для официального брифинга, а не обычной беседы, но я попробую ответить кратко — и, если позволите, своими словами". {n}Абеляр набирает в грудь воздуха и начинает.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g} значительно удален от сердца Империума. Это значит, что здешние {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}-пути приходят в негодность за считанные месяцы, маршруты регулярно подвергаются нападениям разнообразного сброда, а в единственном крупном порту бок о бок швартуются пиратские посудины и имперские фрегаты".

traits.locale_text: "This is a topic for an official briefing, not a casual conversation, but I will try to answer succinctly — and, if you permit, in my own words." {n}Abelard takes a breath and begins.{/n} "The Koronus Expanse is considerably removed from the heart of the Imperium. This means that charts of local Warp routes become useless within months, routes are regularly subject to attacks from all kinds of rabble, and in the only major port, Imperial frigates find themselves moored alongside pirate vessels."

"This is a topic for an official briefing, not a casual conversation, but I will try to answer succinctly — and, if you permit, in my own words." {n}Abelard takes a breath and begins.{/n} "The Koronus Expanse is considerably removed from the heart of the Imperium. This means that local Warp routes become useless within months, routes are regularly subject to attacks from all kinds of rabble, and in the only major port, Imperial frigates find themselves moored alongside pirate vessels."

"This is a topic for an official briefing, not a casual conversation, but I will try to answer succinctly — and, if you permit, in my own words." {n}Abelard takes a breath and begins.{/n} "The Koronus Expanse is considerably removed from the heart of the Imperium. This means that charts of local Warp routes become useless within months, routes are regularly subject to attacks from all kinds of rabble, and in the only major port, Imperial frigates find themselves moored alongside pirate vessels."

"This is a topic for an official briefing, not a casual conversation, but I will try to answer succinctly — and, if you permit, in my own words." {n}Abelard takes a breath and begins.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} is considerably removed from the heart of the Imperium. This means that local {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes become useless within months, established trails are regularly subject to attacks from all kinds of rabble, and in the only major port, Imperial frigates find themselves moored alongside pirate vessels."

"This is a topic for an official briefing, not a casual conversation, but I will try to answer succinctly — and, if you permit, in my own words." {n}Abelard takes a breath and begins.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} is considerably removed from the heart of the Imperium. This means that local {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes become useless within months, established pathways are regularly subject to attacks from all kinds of rabble, and in the only major port, the Imperium's frigates find themselves moored alongside pirate vessels."

languages.text: “这个话题不应该是闲聊的话题，应而该在官方简报中讨论。如果您允许的话，我会以我自己的话，尽可能简洁地回答这个问题。”{n}阿贝拉德喘了口气，说了起来。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}与帝国的中心地带相距甚远。这意味着，这片区域的{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}航线每隔几个月就会失效，已经建立的航线常常会遭到各种敌人的袭击。而在唯一的主要港口中，帝国的护卫舰往往会停泊在海盗船旁边。”
languages.original_text: "This is a topic for an official briefing, not a casual conversation, but I will try to answer succinctly — and, if you permit, in my own words." {n}Abelard takes a breath and begins.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} is considerably removed from the heart of the Imperium. This means that local {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes become useless within months, established pathways are regularly subject to attacks from all kinds of rabble, and in the only major port, the Imperium's frigates find themselves moored alongside pirate vessels."

traits.locale_text: “这个话题不应该是闲聊的话题，应而该在官方简报中讨论。如果您允许的话，我会以我自己的话，尽可能简洁地回答这个问题。”{n}阿贝拉德喘了口气，说了起来。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}与帝国的中心地带相距甚远。这意味着，这片区域的{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}航线每隔几个月就会失效，已经建立的航线常常会遭到各种敌人的袭击。而在唯一的主要港口中，帝国的护卫舰往往会停泊在海盗船旁边。”

languages.original_text: "This is a topic for an official briefing, not a casual conversation, but I will try to answer succinctly — and, if you permit, in my own words." {n}Abelard takes a breath and begins.{/n} "The Koronus Expanse is considerably removed from the heart of the Imperium. This means that local warp routes become useless within months, established pathways are regularly subject to attacks from all kinds of rabble, and in the only major port, the Imperium's frigates find themselves moored alongside pirate vessels."

languages.text: «Este asunto merecería más un informe oficial que una conversación informal, pero intentaré darle una respuesta concisa con mis propias palabras, si me lo permite». {n}Abelard respira profundamente antes de empezar.{/n} «La {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} se encuentra a una distancia considerable del corazón del Imperium. Como consecuencia, las rutas locales de {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} quedan obsoletas en cuestión de meses, los caminos establecidos son presa de ataques por toda clase de gentuza y en el único puerto de gran tamaño las fragatas del Imperium amarran junto a naves piratas».
languages.original_text: "This is a topic for an official briefing, not a casual conversation, but I will try to answer succinctly — and, if you permit, in my own words." {n}Abelard takes a breath and begins.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} is considerably removed from the heart of the Imperium. This means that local {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes become useless within months, established pathways are regularly subject to attacks from all kinds of rabble, and in the only major port, the Imperium's frigates find themselves moored alongside pirate vessels."

traits.locale_text: «Este asunto merecería más un informe oficial que una conversación informal, pero intentaré darle una respuesta concisa con mis propias palabras, si me lo permite». {n}Abelard respira profundamente antes de empezar.{/n} «La {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} se encuentra a una distancia considerable del corazón del Imperium. Como consecuencia, las rutas locales de {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} quedan obsoletas en cuestión de meses, los caminos establecidos son presa de ataques por toda clase de gentuza y en el único puerto de gran tamaño las fragatas imperiales amarran junto a naves piratas».

languages.text: 「これは公的なブリーフィングの議題であり、私的な会話ではございません。ですが、できる限り簡潔に…もしお許しいただけるなら、私の言葉をもってお話しましょう」{n}アベラルドは一息ついてから話し始める。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}は、帝国の中心部からかなり離れた場所に位置しています。そのため、現地の{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープ{/g}航路は数ヶ月で使えなくなり、確立された航路はあらゆる賊徒の襲撃を受ける可能性があり、唯一の主要港では帝国のフリゲートが海賊の船とともに停泊しております」
languages.original_text: "This is a topic for an official briefing, not a casual conversation, but I will try to answer succinctly — and, if you permit, in my own words." {n}Abelard takes a breath and begins.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} is considerably removed from the heart of the Imperium. This means that local {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes become useless within months, established pathways are regularly subject to attacks from all kinds of rabble, and in the only major port, the Imperium's frigates find themselves moored alongside pirate vessels."

traits.locale_text: 「これは公的なブリーフィングの議題であり、私的な会話ではございません。ですが、できる限り簡潔に…もしお許しいただけるなら、私の言葉をもってお話しましょう」{n}アベラルドは一息ついてから話し始める。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}は、帝国の中心部からかなり離れた場所に位置しています。そのため、現地の{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}ワープ{/g}航路は数ヶ月で使えなくなり、確立された航路はあらゆる賊徒の襲撃を受ける可能性があり、唯一の主要港では帝国のフリゲートが海賊の船とともに停泊しております」

languages.text: "Das ist ein Thema für ein offizielles Briefing, nicht für eine zwanglose Unterhaltung, doch ich werde versuchen, Euch prägnant zu antworten — in meinen eigenen Worten, wenn Ihr gestattet." {n}Abelard atmet tief ein und beginnt.{/n} "Die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} liegt weit vom Herzen des Imperiums entfernt. Lokale {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Routen sind daher innerhalb weniger Monate nutzlos, etablierte Pfade werden regelmäßig von allem möglichen Gesindel attackiert, und im einzigen großen Hafen liegen imperiale Fregatten neben Piratenschiffen."
languages.original_text: "This is a topic for an official briefing, not a casual conversation, but I will try to answer succinctly — and, if you permit, in my own words." {n}Abelard takes a breath and begins.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} is considerably removed from the heart of the Imperium. This means that local {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes become useless within months, established pathways are regularly subject to attacks from all kinds of rabble, and in the only major port, the Imperium's frigates find themselves moored alongside pirate vessels."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist ein Thema für ein offizielles Briefing, nicht für eine zwanglose Unterhaltung, doch ich werde versuchen, Euch prägnant zu antworten — in meinen eigenen Worten, wenn Ihr gestattet." {n}Abelard atmet tief ein und beginnt.{/n} "Die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} liegt in weit vom Herzen des Imperiums entfernt. Lokale {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Routen sind daher innerhalb weniger Monate nutzlos, etablierte Pfade werden regelmäßig von allem möglichen Gesindel attackiert, und im einzigen großen Hafen liegen imperiale Fregatten neben Piratenschiffen."

languages.text: « Voilà un sujet qui conviendrait mieux à un briefing officiel, mais je tâcherai de vous répondre succinctement et, si vous le permettez, en employant mes propres mots. » {n}Abélard inspire profondément et commence.{/n} « Les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} sont considérablement éloignées du cœur de l'Imperium. Cela signifie que les routes {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} locales deviennent impraticables au bout de quelques mois, que les itinéraires établis sont régulièrement attaqués par toutes sortes de scélérats, et que les frégates de l'Imperium doivent partager l'unique port majeur avec des vaisseaux pirates. »
languages.original_text: "This is a topic for an official briefing, not a casual conversation, but I will try to answer succinctly — and, if you permit, in my own words." {n}Abelard takes a breath and begins.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} is considerably removed from the heart of the Imperium. This means that local {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes become useless within months, established pathways are regularly subject to attacks from all kinds of rabble, and in the only major port, the Imperium's frigates find themselves moored alongside pirate vessels."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà un sujet qui conviendrait mieux à un briefing officiel, mais je tâcherai de vous répondre succinctement et, si vous le permettez, en employant mes propres mots. » {n}Abélard inspire profondément et commence.{/n} « Les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} sont considérablement éloignées du cœur de l'Imperium. Cela signifie que les routes {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} locales deviennent impraticables au bout de quelques mois, que les itinéraires établis sont régulièrement attaqués par toutes sortes de scélérats, et que les frégates impériales doivent partager l'unique port majeur avec des vaisseaux pirates. »

languages.text: "Bu meseleyi resmî bir toplantıda görüşmek daha uygun olsa da kısa bir yanıt vermeye çalışacağım. İzninizle kendi fikrimi de belirtmek isterim." {n}Abelard, derin bir nefes alıp konuşuyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}, İmparatorluk başkentinden oldukça uzak bir konumda. Yani bölgedeki {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} yolları aylar içinde kullanışsız hâle geliyor. Var olan yollar da mütemadiyen türlü haşeratın saldırılarına maruz kalıyor. Bölgenin tek büyük limanındaysa İmparatorluk fırkateynleri, korsan gemileriyle yan yana demir atıyor."
languages.original_text: "This is a topic for an official briefing, not a casual conversation, but I will try to answer succinctly — and, if you permit, in my own words." {n}Abelard takes a breath and begins.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} is considerably removed from the heart of the Imperium. This means that local {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} routes become useless within months, established pathways are regularly subject to attacks from all kinds of rabble, and in the only major port, the Imperium's frigates find themselves moored alongside pirate vessels."

traits.locale_text: "Bu meseleyi resmi bir toplantıda görüşmek daha uygun olsa da kısa bir yanıt vermeye çalışacağım. İzninizle kendi fikrimi de belirtmek isterim." {n}Abelard bir nefes alıp başlıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}, İmparatorluk başkentinden oldukça uzak bir konumda. Yani bölgedeki {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} yolları aylar içinde kullanışsız hale geliyor. Var olan yollar da mütemadiyen türlü haşeratın saldırılarına maruz kalıyor. Bölgenin tek büyük limanındaysa İmparatorluk fırkateynleri, korsan gemileriyle yan yana demir atıyor."
